name: COVETOUS - ESPEJO FÉMINA
description:
Covetous is a poem of reflexion and anger. A recognition of all of those places in History in which we, women, have been put aside. 
I took a look from a universal perspective of the timeline that is our History to acknowledge those women that were burnt in a stake.
Me veo en las llamas de todas las que ardieron. Las brujas, las sanadoras, las sabias. Las mujeres que perdieron la vida y las que continuaron los árboles genealógicos de los que venimos.
And we cry for an ending of the lies and of the imposition of fears and concepts that don´t make any sense to us all. We sense it is greed, envy, something that dark that ends up buring our place in the world.
